phrases.not_started: Hey bro u dont even started!
phrases.already_started: Hey bro dafuq u doin here? U already started!
phrases.start_hello:
Hi, {first_name}!
Im Fitness (test) Bot!
Say me ur wished weight.
phrases.please_current_weight:
Please, send me ur current weight and date.
For example: "65, 01.01.2022".
phrases.send_current_weight:
Ok, we need u to drop to {weight}kg. Now send me ur current weight
For example: "65, 01.01.2022".
phrases.hooray: Hooray! U got ur weight achievment. Bye.
phrases.last_weight_was: Ok, ur last weight {weight}kg was at {date}. Now i'll be annoy u with notifications >:)
phrases.send_wished: Please, send me ur wished weight firstly.
phrases.weighting_time: Its time for weighing! For example "65, 01.01.2022".
